data.title: King of Spain Alfonso XII, horoscope for birth date 28 November 1857, born in Madrid, with Astrodatabank biography
data.meta_description: Horoscope and astrology data of King of Spain Alfonso XII born on 28 November 1857 Madrid, Spain, with biography
data.text:
Name

Alfonso XII, King of Spain Gender: M

Birthname Alfonso Francisco de Asís Fernando Pío Juan born on 28 November 1857 at 22:15 (= 10:15 PM ) Place Madrid, Spain, 40n24, 3w41 Timezone LMT m3w41 (is local mean time) Data source

BC/BR in hand

Rodden Rating AA Collector: Castellanos

Astrology data 06°43' 00°58 Asc. 21°40'

Biography

Spanish royalty, proclaimed King on 29 December 1874. He married his cousin Maria de las Mercedes on 23 January 1878, a love match that turned into tragedy when she died within six months, 27 July 1878. For state reasons, Alfonso married Maria Christina of Austria and they had two daughters and one son. The latter, Alfonso XIII was born after his dad died on 25 November 1885, Castle El Prado, Spain, age 27.

Link to Wikipedia biography

Relationships

parent->child relationship with Alfonso XIII, King of Spain (born 17 May 1886)

parent->child relationship with Maria Teresa, Infanta of Spain (born 12 November 1882)

parent->child relationship with Mercedes, Princess of Asturias (born 11 September 1880)

child->parent relationship with Francisco, Duke of Cádiz (born 13 May 1822)

child->parent relationship with Isabel II, Queen of Spain (born 10 October 1830)

spouse relationship with de Orleans, Maria de las Mercedes (born 24 June 1860)

spouse relationship with Maria Christina, Queen Consort of Spain (born 21 July 1858). Notes: 1879-1885

sibling relationship with Eulalia, Infanta of Spain (born 12 February 1864)

sibling relationship with Isabel, Princess of Asturias (born 20 December 1851)

sibling relationship with María Cristina, Infanta of Spain (1854) (born 5 January 1854)

sibling relationship with María del Pilar, Infanta of Spain (1861) (born 4 June 1861)

sibling relationship with Maria, Infanta of Spain (born 23 June 1862)

other kin relationship with de Bourbon the Sicilies y Bourbon, Ferdinand (born 6 March 1903)

role played of/by Rey, Roberto (born 15 February 1899). Notes: Theatre play, "El cancionero"

Events

Work : Gain social status 29 December 1874 (Crowned King of Spain)

chart Placidus Equal_H.

Relationship : Marriage 23 January 1878 (Maria de las Mercedes)

chart Placidus Equal_H.

Death of Mate 27 July 1878 (First wife died)

chart Placidus Equal_H.

Death, Cause unspecified 25 November 1885 at 12:00 noon in Castle El Prado, Spain (Age 28 less three days)

chart Placidus Equal_H.

Source Notes

Sy Scholfield quotes "SPAIN: ACCOUCHEMENT OF THE QUEEN," Manchester Guardian, 1 December 1857, p. 2: "A telegraphic despatch from Madrid . . . announces that the Queen was safely delivered of a son at half-past ten o'clock on Saturday night."

Previously this data was rated C: David Fisher quotes Andre Barbault. Penfield Collection quotes Sabian Symbols No.25 (no time given) for same.

In July 2015, Eduardo Castellanos reports on the forum: according to the birth record http://boe.es/datos/pdfs/BOE//1857/1791/A00001-00002.pdf the birth time is 22:15 (not 22:30): "... The Queen felt unwell after noon, with the first announcements of the approaching birth, which began shortly after five in the afternoon, from which time, until the quarter past ten p.m. when the safe delivery was verified, giving His Majesty born a strong Prince, it did not occur any problem ". Rodden Rating has been upgraded to AA.

Categories

Family : Relationship : Marriage less than 3 Yrs (First wife died after six months marriage)

Family : Relationship : Number of Marriages (Two)

Family : Relationship : Widowed (First marriage)

Family : Parenting : Kids 1-3 (Two daughters; one son born posthumous)
